txt.en: To earn this deed, you must destroy all the corpses in Ferndúr's chamber before defeating the Gaunt-lord himself.

Beneath the lost Rhudaur temple in the Trollshaws, the Gaunt-lord Ferndúr creates a deadly plague to decimate the people of the north.\n\nYou must destroy all the infected corpses in his chamber before destroying the Gaunt-lord himself to ensure that his plague is completely eliminated.
Destroy all the corpses in Ferndúr's chamber, then defeat Ferndúr
Discover the entrance to the Lost Temple
To earn this deed, you must destroy all the corpses in Ferndúr's chamber before defeating the Gaunt-lord himself.
You have destroyed all the corpses in Ferndúr's chamber and ended Ferndúr's schemes.
